issue.title: [Rust] [DataFusion] Compilation error with Rust 1.37.0-nightly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5852](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5852). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
```java

error[E0283]: type annotations required: cannot resolve `std::string::String: std::convert::AsRef<_>`
   --> /home/andy/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-1ecc6299db9ec823/rustyline-3.0.0/src/lib.rs:655:43
    |
655 |             editor.add_history_entry(line.as_ref());
    |                                           ^^^^^^

```

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5852?focusedCommentId=16878804) by Andy Grove (andygrove):*
I didn't have the latest code... this was already fixed
